page.title: 04WISHY WATSON
page.content: Wishy's real name was Wilson Watson.He worked on Mr Leather's farm.Wishy wasn't fussy where he slept,once he slept in a barn and sometimes he slept in a tree or under a hedge.Every Saturday he went to Knaresborough (he walked) and bought some fowl smelly meat then he walked home.He gave the meat to Mrs Leather to cook then when it was cooked Mrs Leather gave him it back along with 3 slices of bread and a cup of tea.That is all he lived on.His sister was in service at Balmoral castle.One day Mr Leathers brother took pity on him,took him to Knaresborough,bought him some clothes and a bed and gave him Mr Leather's granary to sleep in.On 10th July 1954 he died.
